description: President Trump said he expected to soon announce that the United States and its coalition partners have reclaimed “100 percent” of the territory once held by the Islamic State. He also said the U.S. would continue to hunt down ISIS fighters “for many years to come.”
title: Trump: Announcement on Total Recapture of ISIS Territory Coming Soon
title_page: Trump: Announcement on Total Recapture of ISIS Territory Coming Soon - The New York Times
maintext: The United States military, our coalition partners and the Syrian Democratic Forces have liberated virtually all of the territory previously held by ISIS in Syria and Iraq. It should be formally announced sometime — probably next week — that we will have 100 percent of the caliphate. But I want to wait for the official word. I don’t want to say it too early. Now you’re always going to have people. They’ll be around. They’re sick, they’re demented, but you’re going to have them no matter how well we do militarily. We will be working with you for many years to come. I say that unfortunately. But that’s the way it goes.
